requirements_definitions.numerical_stability_checks: Verify metric tensor determinant > eps; Verify frame orthogonality error < 1e-6.

requirements_definitions.high_precision: Must use IEEE 754 double-precision (64-bit) or higher. Max relative error < 1e-15.

test_vector_generation.strategy: Random sampling from manifold + boundary cases (e.g., ideal points in H^n).
test_vector_generation.oracle: High-precision reference implementation (e.g., symbolic math library).

compliance_reporting.format: JSON report with pass/fail per vector.
compliance_reporting.aggregation: Overall score based on weighted tier requirements.

conformance_failure.logic: If test vector result deviates from expected by > error_bound
conformance_failure.action: Fail conformance test for that vector

tier_mismatch.logic: If implementation claims Tier N but fails Tier N requirements
